subject: Olympic Games (2008)
organizations: Beijing Bureau of the New York Times
lead_paragraph: Jing Zhang is 28-year-old researcher working in the Beijing Bureau of the New York Times. She watched the Opening Ceremonies and shared her thoughts with us.
